nodes.text: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story  (German audio drama)

Rogue One - A Star Wars Story is an original German-language audio drama adaptation of Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. It contains dramatized passages from the film script performed by a cast in German translation along with narration by Joachim Kerzel. The CD was released by Universal Music in 2018 as part of a series of five single-disc audio adaptations of the sequel trilogy & the two Star Wars Story films.
Despite the English title being untranslated on the product cover, the entire CD is in German.
